meanings.definition: The quality or state of being boxy.
meanings.sent1: The boxinesses of the building made it look very square and angular.
meanings.sent2: The car's boxinesses made it easy to pack a lot of items in the trunk.
meanings.sent3: The boxinesses of the room gave it a very organized and tidy appearance.
meanings.sent4: Her boxinesses in decision-making made her a reliable and efficient leader.
meanings.sent5: The boxinesses of the package made it easy to stack with other boxes.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of resembling a box in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The toy's boxinesses made it easy for the child to hold and play with.
meanings.sent2: The boxinesses of the building's design gave it a modern and minimalist look.
meanings.sent3: The boxinesses of the cake made it look like a delicious square treat.
meanings.sent4: His boxinesses in negotiation tactics made him a tough opponent to beat.
meanings.sent5: The boxinesses of the furniture made the room feel cramped and crowded.
